articles.author: Danish Khan
articles.title: MC Exclusive: Apple to make iPhone 16 Pro and Pro Max models in India this year - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Last year, Apple made iPhone 15 units of India-built iPhones available to Indian customers on the first day of global sales. It not only made the base iPhone 15 model in India, but later followed up with local production of the iPhone 15 Plus by Pegatron.
